page.title: 04Cost of Shopping in Gayton
page.content:
Although in 1985 there are no shops open in Gayton there are two mobile grocers that visit the village each week. Most people, however do their shopping in Northampton. This chart shows the relative prices of articles bought from the mobiles and from a supermarket in Northampton. {ARTICLE Cost/Village Cost/N'pton} Sugar 55p 47p Bread 50p 32p Butter 52p 46p Tomatoes 50p 45p Tea 170p 120p Coffee 325p 267p Milk 23p 22p Eggs 86p 68p
In all cases it was dearer to buy in the village but this was without the cost of travelling to Northampton.
